source.title: Source

id.title: Source Collection ID
id.description: The UUID for the collection which serves as the source of the Move

path.title: Source Collection Path
path.description: The path on the source collection for the data

source.description: Globus-provided flows require that at least one collection is managed under a subscription.

destination.title: Destination

id.title: Destination Collection ID
id.description: The UUID for the collection which serves as the destination for the Move

path.title: Destination Collection Path
path.description: The path on the destination collection where the data will be stored

destination.description: Globus-provided flows require that at least one collection is managed under a subscription.

user_email.title: User email address
user_email.description: Email address to which a notification email will be sent with a request for confirmation of the transfer.

sync_level.title: Synchronization level
sync_level.description: Sync level, must have one of the values 0 (exists), 1 (size), 2 (mtime), 3 (checksum)

verify_checksum.title: Verify checksum
verify_checksum.description: Whether Transfer should verify file checksums and retry if the source and destination don't match

remove_source.title: Remove source after transfer
remove_source.description: Enable or disable the removal of the source files and folders after the transfer has succeeded.

remove_destination.title: Remove destination data
remove_destination.description: Delete files, directories, and symlinks on the destination endpoint which donâ€™t exist on the source endpoint or are a different type. Only applies for recursive directory transfers.

encrypt_data.title: Encrypt data
encrypt_data.description: Whether Transfer should encrypt data sent through the network using TLS

preserve_timestamp.title: Preserve timestamps
preserve_timestamp.description: Whether Transfer should set file timestamps on the destination to match the origin

recursive.title: Recursive copy
recursive.description: If true, copy the entire folder and any subfolders defined by source_path. source_path must refer to a folder/directory

filter_rules.title: Filter rules
filter_rules.description: One or more filter_rules to apply during recursive expansion.

transfer_label.title: Label for Transfer Task
transfer_label.description: A label placed on the Transfer operation

delete_label.title: Label for Delete Task from Source
delete_label.description: A label placed on the Delete operation
